title: Does Jungkook love Jimin like Jimin? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jungkook and Jimin share a special bond! As a jikook shipper myself, I would hope that these two were in a relationship, but these two share a brotherly bond! They always seem comfortable with each other and comfort each other whenever the other one is crying. This is the case with the whole maknae line!

Did you mean as friends? Yes Bts loves eachother as friends and brother. But I dont understand love Jimin like Jimin. Look,Jimin doesnt has double personalyties. Jimin is Jimin if is in stage or in real life I think. So we love Jimin because he is himself. Im sorry if I say smth wrong..
